title: 110_s1180
content: Workforce Housing Construction for the GO Zone Act of 2007 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) extend through 2010 the placed-in-service date requirement for buildings in the Gulf Opportunity Zone for purposes of the low-income housing tax credit. (2) allow a low-income housing tax credit for buildings in the GO Zone, the Rita GO Zone, or the Wilma GO Zone during a specified 10-year period. (3) provide a basis adjustment for low-income housing projects in the GO Zones. (4) exclude Community Development Block Grant funds from consideration in determining whether GO Zone buildings are federally subsidized. And (5) modify certain rules relating to tax-exempt financing of GO Zone buildings.
